metadata.description: Portfolio - Pierre Marquet, web developer and designer.

logo.alt: Logo Pierre Marquet - Web Developer and Designer

projects.squid-marketplace: Project of an e-commerce site for online furniture sales for my Bachelor’s degree in the third year. In a team of 3 people (front-end, back-end and mobile), we created a complete site with a back-office for product and order management, for my part, I created the front-end and the back-office. We chose a squid as our mascot (hence the name Squid Marketplace), to represent the multitasking and versatile side of it with its tentacles.
projects.make-your-dish: For our Master’s degree (first year), our team of four developed a reverse Marmiton-style web application. The app allows users to input the ingredients they have on hand to receive recipe suggestions (both dishes and cocktails).
projects.implic-action-job: A job search web application for the association Implic'action as part of my Master’s degree program. This application is part of a broader project aimed at developing several digital solutions for the association, including an event management application, a community app, and an identity management (IAM SSO) system. The overall objective is to support the association in its mission of professional reintegration. This project involved collaboration between the two Master’s classes, who worked together on these different applications.

about-me.bio: Coming from the world of design, I worked for five years for the Gendarmerie Nationale, creating educational courses with images and animations. I then transitioned to web development and mobile web development, obtaining a Bachelor's and a Master's degree to become more versatile.
about-me.avatar-alt: Profile picture of Pierre Marquet - Web Developer and Designer

anfsi.title: Full-stack Developer Apprentice
anfsi.description:

    2. Reserve management platform (Minotaur)
  • Assistance in website design

deletec.title: Web Developer / Project Manager Apprentice
deletec.description:
• Completion of tasks for two development projects:
    1. GDPR-specific management application for clients
    2. Multi-tenant client portal for managing DELETEC's provided services
  • Organization and facilitation of presentation and decision-making meetings
  • Task and project phase definition
  • Creation and presentation of application prototypes
  • Development of versions as per specifications

tr.title: Web and Mobile Web Developer / Project Manager Intern

  • Teamwork of 5 individuals
  • Front-End development of an MVC application (HTML / CSS / JavaScript)
  • Back-End development of an MVC application (PHP)
  • Creation and management of a database (SQL / MySQL)
